description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Delft is situated between The Hague (Den Haag) (10 km) and Rotterdam (15 km) and is accessible by car via route A13. You can also easily reach Delft by public transport. Frequent trains connect Delft to Amsterdam Schiphol airport and Amsterdam city center in less than an hour. By taking tram no.1, you can go direct from Delft to The Hague city centre and Scheveningen beach boulevard.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Gallery Terra Delft is located in the Nieuwstraat, in the historic centre of Delft. Nearby are -at the Markt- the 14th century ‘Nieuwe Kerk’ (‘New Church’) and the beautiful Town Hall (early 17th century) and -at the Oude Delft- the ‘Oude Kerk’ (‘Old Church’) with its leaning tower dating from 1240 and museum ‘Het Prinsenhof’. Terra is within sight (50 m.) of the old fish-stalls.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Arriving by train: is within walking distance from the Delft railway station (5 minutes walking; direction city centre). Arriving by car (A13): take exit 8 (Delft-Noord) or exit 9 (Delft). Car parks are available close to the city centre, for instance at Phoenixstraat: in the multistory parking garage.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
